file.content:
--- layout: default --- # The Problem

90% AI Adoption, Zero Standardization

  • +20% PRs per author, +23.5% incidents per PR, +30% change failure rate

"AI Amplifies Whatever You Have"

  • Good practices become great. Bad practices become catastrophic.

I've Seen This Firsthand

  • Client project: UI engineer using Cursor without understanding the patterns
  • Result: 5000+ line files, hardcoded strings, 20 components per file
  • Not his fault - he didn't know what he was doing
